allDialogue: Paracelsys, how is your mission going? You came back from Magus faster than I thought you would...
Umm, nothing... just thinking is all.
It's a little bit sad how some people think that they can't survive traveling between Cion and Magus, huh...
Is that part of the reason why so many want to keep the worlds split?
It is human nature to fear the unknown. This is why me must show them what they do not know, even if we must do so by force
I understand. Its honestly just hard to imagine a life where I'd be trapped in one place forever...
Regardless, you must remained focused on your mission. You must slay the mantis and retrieve it's heart.
